resources.string: To confirm your identity, we\'ll need to access your camera.

We'll ask for permission to use the camera on your phone. Then, you'll follow some on-screen instructions to provide us with a picture. 

 We'll compare your picture to your ID to confirm your identity. 

 Valid IDs include a state-issued driver's license or a passport.
It looks like you share this card with someone else. We\'ll text that person before adding the card to your account.
We need a picture of you to make sure it\'s really you. We\'ll compare your picture to your photo ID. \n\n Just center your face in the oval on the next screen and blink when you\'re ready.
It looks like you share this card with someone else. We\'ll text that person before adding the card to your account.
We need a current photo ID to make sure you\'re really you. We\'ll compare your photo ID to the picture we took. \n\n Valid IDs include a state-issued driver\'s license or a passport.
We\'re sorry, things don\'t appear to be working right now
Check back in a little while.
We\'re sorry, things don\'t appear to be working right now
If you cancel, we\'ll need up to %%1$s hours to review your transfer.
